common-statement-copy-error-message: An error occurred while copying the statement.
statement-landing-main-text-label: A transfer with a structured statement is used for the automatic processing of payments. The statement consists of three groups of digits, separated by slashes. The first group has three digits, the second four, and the third five. The statement begins and ends with three plus signs (+++).
create-statement-main-message: Start by typing a number of up to 10 digits, the last two digits (the check digit) will be calculated automatically.
generate-statement-main-message: The structured statement below is automatically generated using a randomly chosen combination of digits.
verify-statement-main-message: Start by typing your structured statement. Our tool automatically checks its validity; a green background indicates that the input is valid.
mobile-landing-text-part-two: Thank you for visiting our website. Unfortunately, our tool is currently not available on mobile devices. We kindly ask you to switch to a desktop device for the best user experience.
